title: How to Use an Android Calculator

steps.title: Open the 'App Drawer' from the home screen.
steps.content: Open the 'App Drawer' from the home screen.

steps.title: Select the calculator app from the 'App Drawer'.
steps.content: Select the calculator app from the 'App Drawer'.

steps.title: Type in whatever calculation you need.
steps.content: Type in whatever calculation you need. You can also click "delete" ('C' Button) to fix any mistakes.

steps.title: Click the menu button and select "Advanced Panel" for more options or swipe from right to left to open the scientific calculator.
steps.content: Click the menu button and select "Advanced Panel" for more options or swipe from right to left to open the scientific calculator. Some advanced stock Android calculators can be switched to scientific calculator by swiping as well.

steps.title: Perform any advanced calculations by using operations like cos and tan.
steps.content: Perform any advanced calculations by using operations like cos and tan .
